full_summary:
# Request for Standing Offer for Sealing Tapes
## Request for Standing Offer - Description
The [Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)](https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/index-eng.html) on behalf of the Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA) invites interested suppliers to submit a Standing Offer for the provision, packaging, and delivery of "Sealing Tapes – Opened by CBSA" (forms E608 and BSF237). The requirement is open to suppliers from Canada and abroad.

## Notice Details

* **Publication Date**: Tuesday, August 2, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date**: Postponed until September 6, 2023 at 14:00 EST
* **Amendment Number**: 4
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3876389937
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and services (Category GD)

## Procurement Information

* **Procurement Method**: Competitive – Open bidding
* **Trade Agreements**: The following trade agreements apply:
  + Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
  + Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  + Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  + World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Open to suppliers from Canada and abroad
* **Regions of Delivery**: Canada

## Contracting Entity and End-User
* **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End-User**: Canada Border Services Agency (CBSA)

## Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Raphael Lafontaine (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email**: [raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:raphael.lafontaine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

## Technical Information
The requirement is for an initial period of one (1) year with an option to extend the offer for two (2) additional periods of one (1) year. Delivery will be made on an "as and when required" basis to the CBSA Mail processing unit, located at 2215 Gladwin Cr, Entrance CO, Ottawa, Ontario.

Note to bidders: all submissions must be received by September 6, 2023 at 14:00 EST. Late submissions will be considered non-responsive.

It is recommended to visit the link below to access
